title:
oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set - 446°F Heat Resistant,Turner Tongs,Spatula,Spoon,Brush,Whisk,Wooden Handles Pink Kitchen Gadgets Tools Set for Nonstick Cookware;

descriptions:
oannao Silicone Cooking Utensil Set – Pink, 14-Piece

- Safe and durable: BPA-free, food-grade silicone that won’t react with food or beverages. Soft, non-scratching heads are ideal for nonstick cookware.
- Built to last: One-piece silicone with a stainless steel core for stability—no warping, no breaking.
- High heat performance: Heat resistant up to 446°F; won’t melt or smoke during high-heat cooking.
- Comfortable control: Smooth wooden handles stay cool and feel secure in hand.
- Easy care: Seamless design leaves no gaps to trap food; hand wash recommended (not dishwasher safe).
- Fast support: Quick after-sales response within 12 hours.

What’s included:
- Deep soup ladle, solid serving spoon, slotted spoon
- Slotted turner, turner, round spatula turner
- Flexible spatula, small silicone spatula
- Pasta server, large skimmer spoon
- Food tongs, basting brush, whisk
- Utensil holder

A complete set for cooking, baking, and mixing—protects your pans and streamlines your kitchen.
